FAQ

Common questions about BarberX Legal Tech

General

What is BarberX Legal Tech?

BarberX is an AI-powered eDiscovery and forensic analysis platform for legal professionals. It specializes in processing body-worn camera (BWC) footage, police reports, and legal documents with 99%+ transcription accuracy, automated entity extraction, and discrepancy detection.

Is my data sent to the cloud?

No. All AI processing happens 100% locally on your machine. Your BWC videos, transcripts, and case data never leave your computer. Enterprise customers can deploy fully air-gapped installations.

Who is BarberX designed for?

BarberX is built for:

  • Defense Attorneys – Analyze evidence and find discrepancies
  • Law Firms – Streamline eDiscovery workflows
  • Public Defenders – Process large case volumes efficiently
  • Investigators – Extract entities and build timelines
  • Compliance Teams – Maintain chain of custody documentation

Features

How accurate is the transcription?

We use OpenAI's Whisper model which achieves 99%+ accuracy on clear audio. Accuracy depends on:

  • Audio quality (better microphones = better results)
  • Background noise levels
  • Speaker accents and clarity

BWC footage typically achieves 95-98% accuracy. All transcripts include confidence scores.

What video formats are supported?

We support all common formats:

  • Video: MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, WebM
  • Audio: MP3, WAV, M4A, FLAC, OGG
  • Documents: PDF, DOCX, DOC, TXT, RTF
  • Images: JPG, PNG, TIFF, BMP, HEIC
Can I export to Word or PDF?

Yes. All analysis reports can be exported to:

  • PDF – Professional court exhibits
  • DOCX – Microsoft Word
  • TXT – Plain text
  • JSON – Structured data for developers
How long does analysis take?

Processing time depends on video length and hardware:

  • 10 minute video: 3-5 minutes
  • 1 hour video: 15-20 minutes
  • 8 hour shift: 2-3 hours

GPU acceleration can reduce these times by 50-70%.

Legal & Security

Is this admissible in court?

Our platform generates court-defensible evidence packages with:

  • SHA-256 chain of custody verification
  • Audit logs of all processing steps
  • Original file preservation
  • Timestamped metadata

Note: Always consult with your legal team. We provide tools for evidence analysis, but attorneys determine admissibility.

How do you handle chain of custody?

Every file uploaded is immediately hashed with SHA-256. This cryptographic fingerprint proves the file hasn't been altered. All processing steps are logged with timestamps, creating a verifiable audit trail exportable for court.

Is my data secure?

Yes. BarberX employs:

  • AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit
  • SOC 2 Type II compliance (Enterprise tier)
  • Role-based access control for team accounts
  • Audit logging of all user actions

Technical

Do I need a GPU?

No, but it helps. All AI models work on CPU-only systems. A GPU (NVIDIA with CUDA) will speed up processing by 2-5x, especially for long videos.

What are the system requirements?

Minimum:

  • Windows 10/11, macOS 11+, or Linux
  • Python 3.8+
  • 8GB RAM
  • 50GB free disk space

Recommended: 16GB+ RAM, NVIDIA GPU with CUDA, SSD storage
